scripts.dev: npm run build && python3 -m http.server 8080 --directory publish
scripts.build: mkdir -p publish/dist && esbuild index.web.tsx --bundle --outfile=publish/dist/main.js --format=esm --external:react --external:react-dom/* --external:recharts --external:firebase/app --external:firebase/auth --external:@revenuecat/purchases-js --log-level=warning --define:import.meta.env.VITE_GEMINI_API_KEY='"'${VITE_GEMINI_API_KEY}'"' --define:import.meta.env.VITE_FIREBASE_API_KEY='"'${VITE_FIREBASE_API_KEY}'"' --define:import.meta.env.VITE_FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN='"'${VITE_FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN}'"' --define:import.meta.env.VITE_FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID='"'${VITE_FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID}'"' --define:import.meta.env.VITE_FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET='"'${VITE_FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET}'"' --define:import.meta.env.VITE_FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID='"'${VITE_FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID}'"' --define:import.meta.env.VITE_FIREBASE_APP_ID='"'${VITE_FIREBASE_APP_ID}'"' --define:import.meta.env.VITE_FIREBASE_MEASUREMENT_ID='"'${VITE_FIREBASE_MEASUREMENT_ID}'"' --define:import.meta.env.VITE_REVENUECAT_API_KEY='"'${VITE_REVENUECAT_API_KEY}'"' && cp index.html publish/ && cp index.css publish/
